nodes.text: 1977 Topps Star Wars Series 1 was a trading card set released by Topps in 1977.

The set was based on Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, and featured stills from the film, promotional photos and behind the scenes photos, all within a blue starfield border. Backs of the cards featured "Story Summary" or "Movie Facts" themes, or included a portion of a larger image that could be pieced together with other cards like a puzzle.  A sub-set of sticker cards was included.

Story information in the set was based on the film itself, as well as some of the supplemental promotional material published around the film's release. Grand Moff Tarkin is referred to as Governor of the Imperial Outlands (mostly known later as the Outer Rim Territories), and lightsabers are called "light sabres." Card 7, "The villainous Darth Vader," uses an image from a deleted scene featuring Vader and Moradmin Bast.
